languages.text: "Вы уверены, Лорд-капитан? Прошу простить за дерзость, но чутье старого пустотного волка подсказывает, что в этом могильнике шансов остаться навсегда побольше, чем на любом другом найденном нами здесь мире. У меня такое скверное предчувствие, будто бы... Виноват, Ваша Светлость. Совсем из ума выжил, советы начал раздавать".

"Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."
languages.original_text: "Вы уверены, Лорд-капитан? Прошу простить за дерзость, но чутье старого пустотного волка подсказывает, что в этом могильнике шансов остаться навсегда побольше, чем на любом другом найденном нами здесь мире. У меня такое скверное предчувствие, будто бы... Виноват, Ваша Светлость. Совсем из ума выжил, советы начал раздавать".

traits.locale_text: "Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for this audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that the chances of remaining forever in this tomb are higher than on any other world we've found. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm completely out of my mind, giving out advice like that..."

"Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for this audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that the chances of remaining forever in this tomb are higher than on any other world we've found. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I'm completely out of my mind, giving out advice like that..."

"Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."

"Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."

"Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."

languages.text: “您确定吗，舰长大人？恕我直言，但我这头虚空老狼的直觉告诉我，这座坟墓很可能也会变成我们的坟墓。我有种很不妙的预感，就好像……抱歉，大人，我肯定是疯了，竟敢给您这样的建议……”
languages.original_text: "Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."

traits.locale_text: “您确定吗，舰长大人？恕我直言，但我这头虚空老狼的直觉告诉我，这座坟墓很可能也会变成我们的坟墓。我有种很不妙的预感，就好像……抱歉，大人，我肯定是疯了，竟敢给您这样的建议……”

languages.text: 「本当に良いのですか、ロード・キャプテン？厚かましくて恐縮ですが この老いぼれのウルフの直感では この墓は我々のものになる 可能性が高いと思われます。嫌な予感がします、まるで…お許しください、閣下。私は正気を失ってしまったようです。こんな助言をあなた様にするなんて…」
languages.original_text: "Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."

traits.locale_text: 「本当に良いのですか、ロード・キャプテン？厚かましくて恐縮ですが この老いぼれのウルフの直感では この墓は我々のものになる 可能性が高いと思われます。嫌な予感がします、まるで…お許しください、閣下。私は正気を失ってしまったようです。こんな助言をあなた様にするなんて…」

languages.text: «¿De verdad, Lord Capitán? Le ruego que me disculpe por tal atrevimiento, pero el instinto de este viejo lobo del vacío dice que es muy probable que esta tumba se convierta en la nuestra. Tengo un mal presentimiento, como si... Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, he perdido completamente la cordura, dando consejos así...».
languages.original_text: "Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad, Lord Capitán? Le ruego que me disculpe por tal atrevimiento, pero el instinto de este viejo lobo del vacío dice que es muy probable que esta tumba se convierta en la nuestra. Tengo un mal presentimiento, como si... Perdóneme, mi{mf|lord|lady}, he perdido completamente la cordura, dando consejos así...»

languages.text: "Seid Ihr sicher, Lord Captain? Verzeiht meine Dreistheit, aber der Bauch dieses alten Leerewolfs sagt ihm, dass dieses Grab höchstwahrscheinlich zu unseren werden wird. Ich habe kein gutes Gefühl, als ... Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich habe völlig den Verstand verloren, Euch ungefragt Ratschläge zu erteilen ..."
languages.original_text: "Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."

traits.locale_text: "Seid Ihr sicher, Lord Captain? Verzeiht meine Dreistheit, aber der Bauch dieses alten Leerewolfs sagt ihm, dass dieses Grab höchstwahrscheinlich zu unseren werden wird. Ich habe kein gutes Gefühl, als ... Verzeiht, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich habe völlig den Verstand verloren, Euch ungefragt Ratschläge zu erteilen ..."

languages.text: « Vous êtes {mf|sûr|sûre}, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Je vous prie de bien vouloir excuser mon audace, mais je sens dans mes tripes que ce tombeau a toutes les chances de devenir le nôtre. J'ai un mauvais pressentiment, comme si... Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, ce n'est pas à moi de vous dire quoi faire... »
languages.original_text: "Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous êtes {mf|sûr|sûre}, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Je vous prie de bien vouloir excuser mon audace, mais je sens dans mes tripes que ce tombeau a toutes les chances de devenir le nôtre. J'ai un mauvais pressentiment, comme si... Pardonnez-moi, Votre Seigneurie, ce n'est pas à moi de vous dire quoi faire... »

languages.text: "Bundan emin misiniz Lord Kaptan? Affedersiniz, üstüme vazife değil ama yıllarım uçsuz kurduyum. İçimden bir his, bu kabrin büyük ihtimalle asıl bize mezar olacağını söylüyor. Öyle kötü bir his ki... Bağışlayın {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, böyle nasihat verdiğime göre aklım başımda değil..."
languages.original_text: "Are you certain, Lord Captain? I beg your pardon for such audacity, but this old void wolf's gut tells him that this tomb is very likely to become ours. I have this bad feeling, as if... Forgive me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I've completely lost my senses, giving out advice like that..."
